courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to kickstart your web development journey.

courses.title: App Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Start your app development journey with React Native and build cross-platform mobile applications.

courses.title: Advanced Backend Development
courses.description: Enhance your backend development skills with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, and build scalable and efficient web applications.

courses.title: DevOps Fundamentals
courses.description: Dive into DevOps and learn about Docker, CI/CD, and Kubernetes to streamline your software development and deployment processes.

courses.title: DevOps Advance
courses.description: Take your DevOps skills to the next level with advanced topics such as deployment to cloud with Docker and Kubernetes.
